Author: talran
Name: Macro Recursion
Punchline: Run multiple macros one after the other.
Description: Allows for a macro to continue onto the next macro by using '/nextmacro' on the last line of a macro. Adding '/nextmacro' on the last line of Macro #01 will automatically execute Macro #02  Adding '/nextmacro down' on the last line of Macro #01 will automatically execute Macro #11 Also allows executing any macro from chat using '/runmacro'.
